That it is never about one thing.

It’s not possible about the W’s or L’s.

A FAMILY ROMANCE

Should you have watched The Big Excess fat Greek Marriage, you will just remember Kostas ‘Gus’ Portokalos issuing a challenge: ‘Give me a expression, any term, and I provide you with that the reason behind that message is Artistic. ‘ And so call us the Gus of college prologue. What’s the value of college or university visits?

Okay… so it’s possible I need to work with some of these somewhat. But the stage is there happen to be parallels concerning everyday life (and love) encounter and the university admission procedure. Hopefully these begin to assistance clarify precisely often seen as mysterious or perhaps veiled.

Within an earlier post, we proven that I communicate Disney. College students:

Parents:
